mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (fromUserName, toUserName, content, create_date,use_yn) VALUES (#{fromUserName}, #{toUserName}, #{content}, NOW(), '1')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_message WHERE (fromUserName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{fromUserName}, '%') AND toUserName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{toUserName}, '%')) OR (fromUserName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{toUserName}, '%') AND toUserName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{fromUserName}, '%')) ORDER BY create_date ASC
